issue.title: [FlightRPC][Docs] Document the authentication methods
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15628](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15628). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We've added several auth methods over the years, but they aren't well documented and it isn't clear how each of them work. Cookbook examples can help but a general overview would also be good to have.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15628?focusedCommentId=17565674) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
